flawed_nl_solution:
Mr. Deane will spend $1.4/liter x 10 liters = $<<1.4*10=41>>41 for the 10 liters of gas today.
The price of the gas per liter on Friday will be $1.4/liter - $0.4/liter = $<<1.4-0.4=1>>1/liter.
So, he will spend $1/liter x 25 liters = $<<1*25=25>>25 for the 25 liters of gas on Friday.
Thus, Mr. Deane will spend a total of $41 + $25 = $<<41+25=66>>66 for the 35 liters of gas.
#### 66

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 14, not 41. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
